description: Next.js API route implementing authentication with NextAuth and Azure AD provider, including user synchronization and session management.

methods.name: findOrCreateAzureUser
methods.description: Asynchronously finds or creates a user in Azure AD based on email and Azure ID, returning user data and token.

methods.name: authOptions
methods.description: Configuration object for NextAuth, including providers, callbacks, pages, session strategy, and secret.
